name: Tetris
description: - Tetromino Class   - Deal with falling blocks.   - Use a 4Ã—4 sequence to deal with the state of tetromino. - Field Class   - Manage game field.   - Treating field regions as arrays and controlling tetrominoes on the field. - View Class   - Handle the display process to the browser.   - Displays the field and tetromino status on the screen. - Game Class   - Manipulating the game, dealing with the rules.   - Processing parts of the rules other than the above class, such as increasing the speed of the automatic fall according to the score, etc.
